item.title: Today I Learned: Enabling Horizontal Pod Autoscaler(HPA) in Kubernetes
item.description: It’s been a while I didn’t post any updates. It’s so busy lately, and it’s hard to find free time to write an article in this past few weeks.

item.title: Mount file to Kubernetes Pod, without Deleting the Existing File — in the Docker-Container in the Same Directory
item.description: A few weeks ago, I made a simple application named tweetor that was about a simple tutorial to create Kubenernetes Clusters in Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

item.title: Integration Test With Database in Golang
item.description: Software testing is a process used to identify the correctness, completeness, and quality of developed computer software.

item.title: CI/CD at Kurio Backend with Buddy.Works
item.description: On my first time joining Kurio Engineering team, a year ago before I wrote this story, we already used CI/CD flow in every teams (mobile team, backend team, and data science team).
